value:
Ah, summer! Everyone cutting loose
in the sun... What could be better?

There's all sorts of knights out there.
Me, I want to be the kind who's
beloved by his people.

You sure you don't want to put on a
swimsuit? That summer breeze feels
nice and cool on the skin.

It's nice to catch some sun between
battles. Maybe I should've brought
Dimitri. He could use a little R&R...

I take flirting seriously. It's gotten me
out of more than a few life-or-death
scrapes...and into some too.

Well, well, a castle full of beauties!
I'm here with a gift for you ladies,
courtesy of $Nf.$k$pMe. I'm the gift. So? Any takers?
See? I'm not just eye candy!
I'm working on my tan!
Ouch. That burns.
Guess you really like me, huh?

Sylvain Jose Gautier, the next
Margrave Gautier, at your service.
Let's go have some fun in the sun.

Summer's all about catching sun,
swimming in the ocean...and of
course, chatting up ladies!$k$pHey, don't make that face! I'm not
just womanizing for fun, you know.
It's important training.$k$pIf I'm going to be a knight who's
beloved by his people, I have to know
my way around the human heart.$k$pThat means learning how to charm
anyone, irrespective of my bloodline
or Crest. You follow?$k$pGood! Now, if you'll excuse me,
I have some training to do with
that woman over there.
(exertion)
You're sunk!
Woah
No splashing!
It's your lucky day.
Surf's up.
Too much for you?
Sink or swim!
Thought I'd die...cold...
Heh
Let's make the most of our time in the sun.
Trying to get under my skin? Cute.
I won't ask if you like my swimsuit. I'll just say you're welcome.
We should've brought Dimitri with us. His Highness could use some R&R...
Swimming's fine, but a nap in the shade is more my style.
So many beauties to choose from. Where do I even start?
Let me know when you need a break. I'll have a drink and a towel ready.
I'm feelin' it.
Need a breather?
Lookin' good.
